comments.body: @santosh1994 Can you insert a comment here above this line to explain what this is required? May you could use https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-python/issues/5163 as a reference.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +89,93 @@            # skip blobs matching current directory path as list_blobs api
            # returns subdirectories as well
            if result.name == prefix:
                continue
            blob_path = result.name[len(artifact_path) + 1 :]
